title: Keeping It 200
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week's episode of #TheFriendZone, it's the Dustin Ross takeover AND our 200th episode! We look back at our very first episode, discuss the many changes over the years, internally and externally, and whether or not we've followed through with our initial intention for the show.

THE FRIEND ZONE LIVE IN NEW YORK. 4TH ANNIVERSARY SHOW ON SATURDAY, AUGUST 10TH - Tickets available now www.thefriendzonelive.com

Wellness Segment: Licensed Therapist, Jor-El Caraballo's new show - The Well Well Podcast https://wellwell.podomatic.com

Black Business of the Week: Healthy Roots Dolls https://linktr.ee/healthyrootsdolls

Thank you to our Sponsors:

A Black Lady Sketch Show - Coming to HBO this Friday night is A Black Lady Sketch Show - a new comedy written by, directed by, and starring black women. Friday at 11 pm only on HBO.

The Secret Lives of Black Women - There's a brand new podcast from stitcher you'll love called The Secret Lives of Black Women.  It's all about Black Women striving to live their best lives and trying not to lose their minds, or be in a constant rage, in the process.

Ben & Jerry's - Treat yourself to your favorite flavor anywhere ice cream is sold or find a new favorite at https://www.benjerry.com

Talkspace - Talkspace has more than 5,000 licensed therapists who are experienced in addressing the challenges we all face. To match with your perfect therapist for a fraction of the price of traditional therapy, go to https://www.talkspace.com and use code ZONE to get $65 off your first month and show your support for this show.

Daily Harvest - Daily Harvest's single serve cups are the ultimate grab-and-go meal or snack for any time of day. Go to https://www.daily-harvest.com and enter promo code FRIENDZONE to get THREE FREE cups in your first box!

Follow us online:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/FriendZonePod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Have a GREAT day!
